awardsHonors.title: Powers-Knapp Scholarship Program
awardsHonors.description: An academic scholarship through the University of Wisconsin - Madison. Excellence in scholarship, leadership, and service is instilled in all scholars during the regular meetings and community service events throughout the student’s college career.
